page.title: 05Population Ardfern/Craignish
page.content: There are 99 people living in the area of the village 'enclosed' by the given map lines, although both the village and parish extend beyond. One baby is due to be born next month. Of these 51 are male & 48 female, & the following facts apply:-retired 13 (4M /9F),unemployed 5M, housewives 16, (but please note many of these do part time &/or voluntary work).There are 9 pre-school children (6M/3F), 7(4M/3F) at primary school,4(1M/3F)at secondary & 7(5M/2F) away from home at private / public schools or further education.23 (14M/9F) are in full-time work (this includes 1M/6F residential staff at the hotel who may not necessarily normally live locally) and 15 (12M of which 1M is part-time S.E/3F) are self-employed. P.S.Baby(boy)born July(add to relevant categories & total now 100!).
